page.title: I-AA Playoffs Open With a Virginia Flavor
page.text: Today's Virginia-Virginia Tech showdown in Blacksburg won't be the only college football game in the Commonwealth with high-stakes implications. Three teams from Virginia play first-round games in the Division I-AA playoffs today, including a top-25 matchup between No. 6 William Mary and No. 11 Hampton at Zable Stadium in Williamsburg.
